# Grid Classwork

![2 * 4](https://res.cloudinary.com/drnqdd87d/image/upload/v1693414503/altschool/oxtmohuvcsswye05wppl.png)

Here's what the DOM structure looks like, for a 2Ã—4 grid:

```html
<div class="grid">
  <div class="row">
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
  </div>
  <div class="row">
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
    <div class="cell"></div>
  </div>
</div>
```
## Features
- **Dynamic Grid**  
  A flexible and responsive grid system has been implemented, allowing for dynamic layout adjustments based on the screen size and content.
